meanings.definition: To honor the memory of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: We will commemorate our fallen heroes by placing flowers on their graves.
meanings.sent2: Every year, we commemorate Veterans Day by attending a parade.
meanings.sent3: Let's commemorate our pet fish by having a fish-themed party!
meanings.sent4: The statue was built to commemorate the bravery of the firefighters.
meanings.sent5: The museum was designed to commemorate the history of our town.

meanings.definition: To celebrate or observe an event or occasion by doing something special.
meanings.sent1: The school will commemorate its anniversary with a big party.
meanings.sent2: Families often commemorate birthdays with cake and presents.
meanings.sent3: We should commemorate the end of exams with a movie night.
meanings.sent4: The painting was created to commemorate the artist's wedding day.
meanings.sent5: The monument was erected to commemorate the town's founding.
